comments:
Version:
BIRT 2.2RC0 and RC02

Component:
WebServices Datasource (org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.Driver and org.eclipse.datatools.enablement.oda.ws ?)

Overview Description:
We have deployed WebViewerExample from birt-runtime-2.2RC0.zip on Tomcat version 5.5.17,5.5.20 and 6.0.13. All reports with WebServices datasource fails. Reports with other datasources works OK.

Steps to reproduce:
Copy the birt-viewer catalog from the birt-runtime-2.2RC0.zip to ${CATALINA_HOME}/webapps directory. Start Tomcat and run a report against a WebService datasource.

Results:
A blank page with no results and this stacktrace in the Tomcat console:

13.jun.2007 12:17:26 org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.odaconsumer.Driver doGetDriverManifest
SEVERE: Cannot process data source extension configuration.

(NB! WebService datasources works fine when we look at them using the integrated web viewer within eclipse - the one contained in birt-report-designer-all-in-one-2.2RCx.zip)

Created an attachment (id=71434)
Example on template that fails

Created an attachment (id=71435)
Example on template that fails
Need to investigate whether ws driver has been packed to BIRT runtime.

That's because there is one plugin missing, however, that plugin has already been set as optional in an earlier fix. Refer to bug 191417 for more info.
Please give RC3 build a try, Thanks for choosing BIRT.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 191417 ***

Hello!

I downloaded RC3 and everything works fine now :-)

And thanks for quick responses and fixing the problem. Keep up the good work!
